```{r}
set.seed(3)
cor_level = .3
library(MASS)
n = 30
Sigma = matrix(c(1,cor_level,cor_level,1),2,2)
res = mvrnorm(n=n, mu = c(110,120), Sigma )
lm_res<-lm(res[,2] ~ res[,1])
raw_t2 = res[,2]
raw_t1 = res[,1]
raw_diff = raw_t2 - raw_t1
residual = lm_res$residuals
#create tidy matrix for comparing values
tidy_table = data.frame(raw_t2,raw_t1,raw_diff,residual)
```

```{r}
plot(res,pch = '',xlab = 'weight at time 1', ylab = 'weight at time 2')
text(res[,1], res[,2],labels = seq(1,n), cex = .7)
abline(lm_res)
cor(res[,1], res[,2])

#tidy_table
plot(raw_diff,residual,pch = '')
text(raw_diff,residual,labels = seq(1,n), cex = .7)
cor(raw_diff,residual)
```
